Scheduling Future Reductions
For Section 306 Pension eligibility, the protected 1978 income data is the basis for payment for all periods during which actual or estimated income is within the income limitation.
The award should show any future reduction to the Veteran or surviving spouse alone rate based on the protected 1978 IVAP provided current year IVAP is within the current income limit.
